src.engine.lighting

Class Segment

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.engine.lighting.Segment

  • public class Segment
extends java.lang.Object
    Segment is a class representing an ordered tuple of two points which defines a single line segment making up the LightWorld

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • setBeginPoint

        public void setBeginPoint(Vec2f p)
        Setter method for the beginning point of the segment. If the beginPoint is already set, nothing is changed.
        Parameters:
        p - The point to set the beginning point to.

      • setEndPoint

        public void setEndPoint(Vec2f p)
        Setter method for the ending point of this segment. If the endPoint is already set, nothing is changed.
        Parameters:
        p - The point to set the ending point to

        Accessor method for the beginning point of the segment
        Returns:
        The beginning point of the segment

      • getEndPoint

        public Vec2f getEndPoint()
        Accessor method for the ending point of the segment.
        Returns:
        The ending point of the segment
